text: Curling Québec is the regional governing body for the sport of curling in Quebec. It was founded in 1976 and is one of Curling Canada's 14 member associations. == Provincial championships == Curling Québec hosts nine provincial championships annually: * WFG Tankard (Men's) * Quebec Scotties Tournament of Hearts (Women's) * Mixed Doubles * Mixed * Masters Men's * Masters Women's * Wheelchair * Senior Men's * Senior Women's == See also == * List of curling clubs in Quebec == References == == External links == * Official website Category:Curling governing bodies in Canada Category:Sports governing bodies in Quebec Category:Curling in Quebec
title: Curling Québec
